amendment.description: An amendment numbered 94 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to defund the United States Institute of Peace and transfer funds to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A051) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A051) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Buck.
